Key Match Events: Thompson's contribution helped spread the Pacers' defense for Luka Doncic to take advantage of
The Mavericks tied the game at 47 apiece with 4:58 remaining in the second period
Thompson scored back-to-back 3-pointers and dished an assist to Naji Marshall to tie the game at 67 apiece
Post-Match Reflections: The Mavericks, though, couldn't defend home court, losing 134-127
Miscellaneous Highlights: Klay Thompson and the Mavericks remain at home in their next two games
The Mavericks are 2-2 at American Airlines Center to start the season
